name: INCORPORATION CORP.
description:
It is time to get a tasty coffee !

Embody a boomerang world champion stuck at work whose only wish is to take a sweet break at the coffee machine. Unfortunately, zombies are blocking the way and seem pretty aggresive. Of course, everyone would be upset a Monday...

/!\ PLAY WITH A CONTROLLER IF YOU CAN /!\

Left Joystick / WASD : Move this good-looking boy

X button / Space bar : Throw a meaningful object and reflect it when it comes back

Enjoy !

Made by:

Kilian BAPTENDIER - Charlie MOREL - Hugo LEANG - Mathis BRESSAUD - Maxime DRIOT

The actress playing Magalie is a stunt professional, please don't try this at home.
